nodes.text: A B1-Series battle droid participated in the Battle of Dathomir around 21 BBY under command of Separatist Supreme Commander General Grievous.

This droid along with the rest of the droid army fought the Nightsisters clan on the planet of Dathomir around 21 BBY. During the battle, he informed a fellow droid to fire the Defoliator Deployment Tank, killing many of the Nightsisters. The droid along with the rest of the squadron was eventually killed by the undead army of the Nightsisters, summoned by Old Daka.
The B1 battle droid, like every battle droid in The Clone Wars movie and The Clone Wars TV series, was voiced by Matthew Wood. His name was never given.
